title: Check Electrical Permit Status
description: A project manager needs to check the status of the electrical permit before starting the wiring work.

tasks.description: Query the city's online permit portal for the project's electrical permit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves the permit status.

tasks.description: Confirm the permit status is 'Issued' and log this confirmation in the project's compliance documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The permit status is confirmed and a record is made in the project logs.
